NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Document creation, drawing, imaging, scheduling and productivity software package

Programski paket za stvaranje dokumenta, crtanje, slikovni prikaz, vremensko planiranje i produktivnost

TITLE.P: 16/6593 Case and archive system for Søre Sunnmøre IKT

SHORT_DESCR.P: The objective and scope of the contract:

The competition is for a contract for the delivery of an electronic case / archive system with support / maintenance. This means a complete system for the municipalities and it shall ensure that daily operations function as optimally as possible. Companies that the participants have ownership interests in shall also be able to use the system without extra cost.

There will be a strong focus on efficient work processes in the municipalities and a new case / archive system shall support this. The system shall therefore have a close integration between the administrative systems and not at least the professional systems in the municipalities, in such a way that double registrations and unnecessary work processes are eliminated.

MAIN_SITE.P: NB: Volda and Hornindal municipalities shall merge from 1.1.2020. The new name will be Volda municipality.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The competition is for a contract for the delivery of an electronic case / archive system with support / maintenance. This means a complete system for the municipalities and it shall ensure that daily operations function as optimally as possible. Companies that the participants have ownership interests in shall also be able to use the system without extra cost.

There will be a strong focus on efficient work processes in the municipalities and a new case / archive system shall support this. The system shall therefore have a close integration between the administrative systems and not at least the professional systems in the municipalities, in such a way that double registrations and unnecessary work processes are eliminated.

The Contracting Authority expects the new system to be commissioned 1.6.2019 for all participants, but the contracting authority shall reserve the right to decide when the different parts of the system shall be taken into use. The implementation and use be agreed with the new supplier.

NB: A draft for tender documentation with requirement specifications and price forms are linked to the Notice. The Contracting Authority reserves the right to make changes in the documentation up until the deadline for qualification.

SUITABILITY.P: (ESPD: Part II A.e) Certificates for Tax and VAT.
The tenderer shall have settled conditions in relation to payment of taxes and VAT.
(ESPD: Part IV B.58-3) Other economic and financial requirements: Economic and financial position.
Requirements regarding the tenderer's economic and financial position: the financial capacity to fulfil the contract is required.
